originalText.text: My kids (now 7 & 9) have both been studying with Soyulla teachers for several years, and we could not be more thrilled.  My son looks forward to his piano lessons and my daughter is very excited to branch out from piano into voice with a new teacher this fall!  Their teachers are very talented at teaching music theory and mechanics, but are also warm and kind and make lessons fun.  They tailor the lessons to the kids' interests and abilities, and bring out the kids' love for music.  I highly recommend Soyulla to any family who loves having music in their home!

originalText.text: Working with Paul has been absolutely amazing! I have been singing my whole life and have worked with so many different coaches. There is something so special about the way Paul teaches! He has the ability to communicate SO clearly exactly what’s going on and has made it very easy for me to understand my voice in a way I didn’t before. I would recommend him to anyone that is interested in learning more about their voice! He makes everything fun, easy to understand and is so knowledgeable!

originalText.text: I can't say enough great things about Soyulla Stars! I have requested professional musicians for various corporate and personal events. They are experts in what they do, recommend exceptional musicians, and best of all make all the arrangements so easy. I hosted a gala this spring and N'Kenge, a Tony award nominated singer and one of the artists through Soyulla performed a medley of broadway hits and blew everyone away! I highly recommend their services if you're looking to add a little sparkle to your event.

originalText.text: My son has been taking piano lessons with Soyulla.  I really appreciate the thoughtfulness and flexibility of Jae and her staff in matching my son with good piano teacher, who is professional, patient and engaging.  I myself have also been taking violin lessons with Soyulla and my violin teacher is absolutely wonderful!  The staff is very responsive and organized.  I have had a great experience and would highly recommend Soyulla!

text.text: My son has been taking piano lessons with Soyulla. originalText.text:
I am very pleased with the services that Soyulla Artists provides and would highly recommend them to anyone who wants to take music lessons. When I learned music growing up, it was strictly classical and I was really hoping for a teacher who would give my daughter a completely different experience, and Soyulla matched her to a teacher who is fun, thoughtful, patient, and engaging, all while making sure my daughter is musically progressing.

Signup was easy and quick. Their staff is friendly, helpful, and introduced us to a teacher within a day. They were also able to work with our busy schedule, which we've had trouble communicating with past organizations. As a busy parent and musician, Soyulla Artists is the place to go for music lessons.
